title: UEFA Champions League : Sublime Choupo - Moting , Anguissa , Onana
body_text:
UEFA Champions League : Sublime Choupo-Moting, Anguissa, Onana
- Par Dilian WELLENG
- 06 Oct 2022 09:25
- 0 Likes
The Cameroonian international players contributed greatly to the success of their clubs on match Day 3 of the championship played on October 4, 2022.
As the 2022 UEFA Champions League rides on, Cameroonian international players continue to write their names in golden books of football. On match Day 3 of the competition played on Tuesday, October 4, 2022, three Cameroonian players including Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting, Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa and Andre Onana were all productive in their various clubs.
Choupo-Moting is top on list after scoring his first goal of the season with Bayern Munich. The Indomitable Lion’s forward came from the bench to score Bayern’s last and fifth goal against Viktoria Plzen (5-0). Worth mentioning is the fact that Choupo-Moting started the season timidly and this goal will definitely be a morale booster to the player who has been in the club since 2020. After Tuesday’s victory, Bayern remains top in Group C with nine points after winning all three matches.
Cameroon’s international midfielder Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa continue to shine in the Champions League. The player once more distinguished himself during the large victory of Napoli against Ajax Amsterdam (6-1) on Tuesday. He made two assists on the third and fourth goals of his team during the encounter. This performance comes to...
